Package NTNU.IDATT1002.service

Class AlbumService

  • java.lang.Object
    • NTNU.IDATT1002.service.AlbumService
  • public class AlbumService
extends java.lang.Object
    Album Service. Supports common domain specific operations such as creating an album, adding images and tags as well as searching by an arbitrary query.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      AlbumService​(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
      Inject entity manager instance to the repositories.

        public AlbumDocument getDocument​(java.lang.Long albumId)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
